japanese:
（へえ……。
　こんな所にもビーチがあったんだな）
translation:
(Wow...
 I had no idea there was a beach here.)

japanese:
あら？
上杉君もこちらへ来たのですね。
translation:
Oh?
You came here too, Uesugi-kun.

japanese:
お前らもいたのか。
それにしても綺麗な海だな。
translation:
Hey, you guys are here too?
The ocean is really beautiful.

japanese:
ええ、本当に！
さすが、エメラルドビーチと
名付けられただけはあります。
translation:
Yes, it is!
As expected of a beach named Emerald Beach.

japanese: ああ、見事なエメラルドグリーンだ。
translation: Yeah, it's a stunning emerald green.

japanese:
砂浜も真っ白で……。
思いがけず素敵な場所を発見してしまいました。
translation:
The sand is so white, too...
We unexpectedly stumbled upon a lovely place.

japanese:
上杉君もこっちへ来てはどうです？
水が冷たくて気持ちいいですよ。
translation:
Why don't you come over here, Uesugi-kun?
The water is cool and refreshing.

japanese:
ふふっ！
打ち寄せる波で足元がくすぐったいですね。
translation:
Heheh!
The waves washing up to shore tickle my feet.

japanese:
おい？
あんまりはしゃいで転んだりするなよ？
translation:
Hey, now.
Don't get too carried away and fall.

japanese: はーい。
translation: Okaaay.

japanese: まったく、子どもみたいにはしゃぎやがって。
translation:
Geez, you're acting like children,
running around like that.

japanese:
（まあ、こんな綺麗な海を見たら
　テンションも上がるか）
translation:
(Well, I guess my spirits
 are also lifted by such a beautiful sea.)

japanese:
あら、あの子たち双子かしら？
可愛いわねぇ。
translation: Hey, those girls over there, are they twins?

japanese:
ええ、本当に。
お洋服もお揃いで、仲良しなのね。
translation:
They sure are.
They seem very close with their matching outfits.

japanese:
（……またか。
　他の場所よりも観光客は少ないが、
　やっぱり注目されちまってるみたいだな）
translation:
(...Here we go again.
 Even though there are fewer tourists here
 than in other places, they still attract attention.)

japanese:
（２人なら大丈夫かと思ってたが……
　これだけはしゃいでいたら目立っても当然か）
translation:
(Though I thought it would be fine
 if it's just the two of them...
 It's only natural they stand out being this lively.)

japanese: なあ、そろそろ別の場所へ行こうぜ。
translation: Hey, let's head over to somewhere else.

japanese:
なにを言っているんですか。
こんなに綺麗な海岸なんですよ？
思う存分、堪能しておかなければもったいないです！
translation:
What are you talking about?
This is such a beautiful coast.
We should fully enjoy it while we're here!

japanese:
あ、おい、あんまり離れるなって。
ややこしい連中に絡まれたりしたら面倒だろ？
translation:
Ah, hey, don't go too far.
It'll be a hassle if you get tangled up 
with any troublemakers.

japanese:
あら？
ややこしい連中とはどういった人たちでしょう？
translation:
Oh?
Who are these troublesome people you speak of?

japanese: もしかして……ナンパですか？
translation: Could it be...pick-up artists?

japanese: まあ、そういうのだな。
translation: Well, I suppose so.

japanese: でしたら、こうすれば！
translation: Then, we'll do this!

japanese: えっ！？
translation: Eh?!

japanese: なるほど、こうですね？
translation: Ah, I see! Like this?!

japanese: お、おい、ちょっと待て！？
translation: H-hey, what are you doing?!

japanese: なにを待つのですか？
translation: What are you waiting for?

japanese: むしろ、なかなかの名案だと思いません？
translation: Actually, it's a pretty good idea, isn't it?

japanese: いいから離れろって！
translation: Just back off, will you?!

japanese:
ややこしい連中対策なのですから、
それはできません。
translation:
It's to deal with any troublemakers,
so we can't do that.

japanese:
はい。
こうしていれば安心ですから。
translation:
Yes, that's right.
We can stay like this, and feel safe.

japanese: これは……余計に目立つだろ。
translation: This is only going to make us stand out more.

japanese:
そうでしょうか？
観光地であれば、意外と普通では？
translation:
Do you think so?
It's pretty normal in tourist spots, isn't it?

japanese:
そんなわけあるか。
もう、いいから離れろって。
translation:
What kind of logic is that?
Just back off already.

japanese:
離れるなと言ったくせに、今度は離れろなんて。
あなたは注文が多い人ですね。
translation:
You said not to go too far,
and now you're telling me to go away?
You're a very demanding person.

japanese: まあ、対策にはなりそうだな。
translation: Well, I guess this could work, huh?

japanese:
でしょう？
あなたも悪い気はしないでしょうし。
translation:
Is that so?
You don't seem to mind it, do you?

japanese: い、いや、そういうことじゃなくてだな！？
translation: N-no, that's not what I meant!

japanese: つーか、これ、俺はどういう立場なんだ？
translation: I mean, what's my position in all this?

japanese:
そこが気になるんですか？
そうですね……。
translation:
Is that bothering you?
Well...

japanese: ２人と同時に付き合ってるダメな男、でしょうね。
translation:
You might be a sleazy guy who's dating both of us
at the same time.

japanese: もしくは、女性を騙す悪い男なのかもしれません。
translation:
Or, maybe you're a questionable guy
who deceives women.

japanese:
ちょ、ちょっと待て！
勝手に悪者にすんなよ！
translation: Hold on a second! Don't just label me as the bad guy!

japanese:
これなら、ややこしい連中とやらも
私たちには近づいてきませんね。
translation:
This way, any nearby troublesome guys
won't come near us, right?

japanese: それ以上に悪目立ちしてるだろ！？
translation: But we're standing out even more, aren't we?!

japanese: そんなことを言っていますが、本当は嬉しいのでは？
translation:
You say that, but deep down you're actually happy,
aren't you?

japanese: べ、別にそんなことは……。
translation: N-no, it's not like that...

japanese:
照れなくてもいいんですよ？
あなたは、もっと素直になるべきなんです。
translation:
It's okay to not be embarrassed, you know.
You should be more honest with yourself.

japanese:
（からかいやがって……。
　もしかして、こいつは一花じゃねぇか？）
translation:
(Teasing me like this...
 Could this be Ichika?)

japanese:
（いや、他の姉妹が一花っぽくしてる可能性もある。
　……どっちなんだ？）
translation:
(No, it could also be one of the other sisters
 acting like Ichika... Which is it?)

japanese:
嬉しいのか、嬉しくないのか、ただそれだけです。
どっちなんですか？
translation:
Are you happy, or not?
That's all I want to know.

japanese:
どっちでもいいから……
とにかく、いったん離れてくれ！
translation:
It doesn't matter either way...
Just please, get off me already!

japanese:
はぁ……。
ったく、無駄に疲れた気がする。
translation:
*sigh*
Come on, I feel like I'm wasting my energy for nothing.

japanese:
ですが、上杉君が望んでいたのは
こういうことなのでは？
translation: But isn't this what you wanted, Uesugi-kun?

japanese: ……はっ？
translation: ...Huh?

japanese:
お前たち５人が好きだ。
ずっと、このままの関係でいられたらと願っている。
translation:
'I really love you five.
I hope we can stay in this same relationship forever,
the six of us.'

japanese: 学園祭の初日、あなたが言った言葉です。
translation: You said that on the first day of the school festival.

japanese: いや、それは……。
translation: Well, that's...

japanese: そのうえ『誰も選ばない』だなんて。
translation: And then to 'not choose anyone,' on top of all that.

japanese:
あの言葉、突き詰めれば
こういうことにもなり得ますから。
translation:
Words like that can lead to this kind of situation,
if you really think about it.

japanese:
『誰も選ばない』なんて、
私たち５人から好かれている自信がなければ
言えない台詞ですしね。
translation:
Saying to 'not choose anyone' is a line
that couldn't be said, unless you had confidence
that all five of us liked you.

japanese:
そ、そんなつもりはなかった。
ただ俺は――
translation:
I-I didn't mean it like that.
I just%p-2;――

japanese: なんて、冗談ですよ。
translation: Oh, come on. It was just a joke.

japanese:
ええ、ちょっとした冗談です。
気にしないでください。
translation:
Yes, it was just a little joke.
Don't worry about it.

japanese: なんだよ、冗談って……。
translation: What do you mean, a joke...

japanese: 少し目立ちすぎてしまいましたね。
translation:
It seems like we really are attracting 
too much attention now.

japanese:
ええ、さきほどから注目されていますし、
また騒がれてしまう前に移動しましょうか。
translation:
Yes, shall we move before we cause any more commotion,
like we did before?

japanese: お、おい！？
translation: H-hey?!

japanese: （……さっきのは本当に冗談だったのか？）
translation: (...Was she really joking just now?)
